repair.repairedDockerfile:
FROM golang:1.17-alpine AS builder
RUN apk add --no-cache git
WORKDIR /app
COPY . .
RUN go get
RUN go build

FROM alpine:3.14
WORKDIR /app
COPY --from=builder /app/cluster-operator /app/
CMD ["./cluster-operator"]
